base_prompt: Which animal is known as the King of the Jungle?
base_response: The animal known as the King of the Jungle is usually associated with lions.

variation_responses.Which beast is known as the King of the: The lion is often referred to as the King of the Jungle.
variation_responses.Can you tell me: Which animal is known a: The lion is often referred to as the "King of the Jungle."
